definition: to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: In 1966 the situation reached crisis point and Utzon resigned from the project.
sentences.chinese: 1966年情況變得危急，伍松辭去了任務。

sentences.english: Earlier this week Kuttner announced he was stepping down from his role
sentences.chinese: 本週早些時候，庫特納宣佈將辭去自己的職務。

sentences.english: None of these people resigned from office.
sentences.chinese: 這些人沒有一個辭去了官位。

sentences.english: MengFei resigned from the galactic work, but in the heart of the earth can't throw Chen son.
sentences.chinese: 孟菲辭去了銀河工作，但是陳超心裏照舊丟不下欣兒。

sentences.english: He resigned in 1927 and decided to become a writer.
sentences.chinese: 1927年，奧威爾辭去職務，決意成爲一名作家。

sentences.english: He resigned his post as chief engineer.
sentences.chinese: 他辭去了總工程師的職務。

sentences.english: Man 2: What happened was that he was so sure that he would get the job that he quit his old job.
sentences.chinese: 他過於自信能得到新工作於是辭去原來的工作。

sentences.english: Then he quitted the official position and restarted a fisherman's family life.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他辭去了官職，重新過起捕魚爲生的漁家生活。

sentences.english: He resigned the editorship of the school paper.
sentences.chinese: 他辭去了校報編輯的職務。

sentences.english: Heis mpostinge up his mind to quit his job.
sentences.chinese: 他已斷定辭去他的工作。

sentences.english: He threw up a well-paid job.
sentences.chinese: 他辭去了一個報酬非厚的工作。

sentences.english: The act or an instance of vacating.
sentences.chinese: 空出，撤出，辭去辭職的行爲或實例。

sentences.english: Shixian resigns as the chairman of board and asks Old Madam Hong to take over the post.
sentences.chinese: 世賢決定辭去董事長的職位，由洪老太接任。

sentences.english: Money mother Xu fei resign, great promotion for governor separated.
sentences.chinese: 許飛辭去職務分開，多多升職爲總監。

sentences.english: I'm thinking of quitting my job.
sentences.chinese: 我籌算辭去現在的工作。

sentences.english: Earily this year, Lam resigned from her role as group ECD at TBWA China Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 林於今年早期辭去騰邁上海的集團執行創意總監一職。
